order_food.description: User wants to order food (general intent)

browse_menu.description: User wants to see menu/options from a restaurant

browse_stores.description: User wants to see available restaurants/stores

ask_price.description: User asks about price of item or delivery

check_offers.description: User asks about offers, discounts, or coupons

add_to_cart.description: User wants to add a specific item to cart

view_cart.description: User wants to see what's in their cart

update_quantity.description: User wants to change quantity of an item in cart

remove_from_cart.description: User wants to remove an item from cart

clear_cart.description: User wants to clear entire cart

customize_order.description: User wants to customize food (extra cheese, less spicy, etc.)

checkout.description: User wants to proceed to checkout/payment

repeat_order.description: User wants to repeat a previous order

cancel_order.description: User wants to cancel a placed order

bulk_order.description: User wants to place a large/bulk order

search_product.description: User searching for a specific product (e-commerce)

parcel_booking.description: User wants to send/book a parcel/courier

track_order.description: User wants to track their order status

login.description: User wants to login, signup, or authenticate

help.description: User needs help or assistance with the bot

complaint.description: User has a complaint about order, delivery, quality

payment_issue.description: User has payment or wallet related issues

feedback.description: User giving feedback about their experience

human_takeover.description: User explicitly wants to talk to a human agent

use_saved.description: User wants to use saved info (details, address, payment method)
